Cross site header

Cross site header

A header for business.gov.au sister sites.

On this page

  • Guidelines for use

Visual design

Design view:

Mobile design

Desktop designs can be viewed on screens wider than 650px.

business.gov.au
Sign in

CSS styles

Desktop

Links
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: normal;
    text-decoration: none;
}
Links container
.links-container {
    background: #18335C;
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
}
Site logo container
.logo-container {
    background: #254F90;
    padding-top: 32px;
    padding-bottom: 32px;
}

Mobile

Links
a {
    font-size: 13px;
}
Links container
.links-container {
    padding-top: 8px;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}
Site logo container
.logo-container {
    padding-top: 16px;
    padding-bottom: 16px;
}

Guidelines for use.

Purpose

When to use this component

Layouts

Page width

Present on all pages of a business.gov.au sister site.

Full width layout

Desktop, Tablet & Mobile: One component per page. Page headers are wider than the body content and extend the full width of the screen.
